original: @126a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @126a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tat t'a au pa de sha shi kha ra do ha g'i ha n'a ma /
analyzed: tat t'a au pa de sha shi kha ra do ha g'i ha n'a ma /

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba /
translated: The Song of the Dohas, the Pinnacle of Instructions on Reality

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩma g-yos sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // ma g-yos sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: Homage to the noble Manjushri.üîΩThe meaning of the vajra pinnacle song

original: rdo rje rtse mo cig car glu blangs don //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo cig car glu blangs don //
translated: is sung all at once with the nature of the unmoving body, speech, and mind.üîΩWhen the connate is understood,

original: gang tshe lhan cig skyes pa dag / go ba dgu yis rtogs par bya //
analyzed: gang tshe lhan cig skyes pa dag / go ba dgu yis rtogs par bya //
translated: it is realized through nine metaphors.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhal bya la sogs med //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhal bya la sogs med //
translated: There are no reasons, objects of appraisal, and so on.

original: dngos po rnams kyi kho na nyid //üîΩdgag dang sgrub pa med pa ste //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi kho na nyid // dgag dang sgrub pa med pa ste //
translated: The reality of thingsüîΩis explained as being free from negation and affirmation

original: dbye ba la sogs med par @126b bshad //
analyzed: dbye ba la sogs med par @126b bshad //
translated: and without divisions and so on.

original: mi mthun phyogs rnams gnyen po med //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs rnams gnyen po med //
translated: There are no antidotes to discordant classes.üîΩThere is no morality, stinginess,

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims ser sna dang // le lo khong khro rnam par g-yeng //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims ser sna dang // le lo khong khro rnam par g-yeng //
translated: laziness, anger, and distraction.üîΩThere is no ignorance, objects to abandon, and so on,

original: ma rig spang bya la sogs dang // spong byed pa rol phyin pa med //
analyzed: ma rig spang bya la sogs dang // spong byed pa rol phyin pa med //
translated: and no antidotes, the perfections.

original: dngos kun med par bshad pa ste //
analyzed: dngos kun med par bshad pa ste //
translated: All things are explained as nonexistent.

original: rtog med snyam sems kun dang bral //
analyzed: rtog med snyam sems kun dang bral //
translated: Free from all thoughts of nonconceptuality.

original: 'khor ba las gzhan phyag rgya che //
analyzed: 'khor ba las gzhan phyag rgya che //
translated: MahƒÅmudrƒÅ is nothing other than sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: gcig kyang phog par ma bshad gang //
analyzed: gcig kyang phog par ma bshad gang //
translated: It is not explained as being struck by anything.

original: de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam //
analyzed: de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam //
translated: That itself is the path of perfect buddhahood.

original: 'dod yon la sogs ma smad pas //
analyzed: 'dod yon la sogs ma smad pas //
translated: Since sense pleasures and so on are not disparaged,

original: 'bras bu re ba med pa ste //
analyzed: 'bras bu re ba med pa ste //
translated: there is no hope for a result.

original: sku gsum lam gyi ngo bo gang //
analyzed: sku gsum lam gyi ngo bo gang //
translated: What is the essence of the path of the three kƒÅyas?

original: ci phyir zhe na mi rtog ste /
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na mi rtog ste /
translated: Why? Because it is nonconceptual.

original: kho na nyid ni ji ltar rtogs //
analyzed: kho na nyid ni ji ltar rtogs //
translated: How is the true nature realized?

original: gzhan la mi re gang gis phar //
analyzed: gzhan la mi re gang gis phar //
translated: Since one does not hope for anything else,

original: rin chen gter dang rgyal po'i dkor //
analyzed: rin chen gter dang rgyal po'i dkor //
translated: it is like a precious treasure, a royal treasure,

original: phal pa yi ni bang mdzod bzhin //
analyzed: phal pa yi ni bang mdzod bzhin //
translated: and like the storehouse of ordinary beings.

original: mchog tu gces pa rang la gnas //
analyzed: mchog tu gces pa rang la gnas //
translated: The most cherished thing rests in oneself.

original: sems las ma gtogs phyi rol don //
analyzed: sems las ma gtogs phyi rol don //
translated: Apart from the mind, not a single external thing

original: gcig kyang yod par ma bshad de //
analyzed: gcig kyang yod par ma bshad de //
translated: is explained as existing.

original: sems nyid kun du 'od gsal ba'o //üîΩde bas sems las gzhan pa'i chos //
analyzed: sems nyid kun du 'od gsal ba'o // de bas sems las gzhan pa'i chos //
translated: The mind itself is completely luminous.üîΩTherefore, when the mind is properly examined,

original: yang dag par ni brtags na med //
analyzed: yang dag par ni brtags na med //
translated: there is no phenomenon that exists apart from the mind.

original: dngos kun zung 'jug rang bzhin la //
analyzed: dngos kun zung 'jug rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of the union of all entities,

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
translated: the nature of arising does not exist.

original: ngo bo ma skyes stong pa gang //
analyzed: ngo bo ma skyes stong pa gang //
translated: The essence is unborn emptiness.

original: gzhan na yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: gzhan na yod pa ma yin te //
translated: It does not exist elsewhere.

original: gnyis dang yod med tha snyad bral //
analyzed: gnyis dang yod med tha snyad bral //
translated: It is free from the conventions of both existence and nonexistence.

original: gcig dang du ma la sogs kyis //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma la sogs kyis //
translated: When examined with singularity, multiplicity, and so on,

original: brtags na med pa ma yin te //
analyzed: brtags na med pa ma yin te //
translated: it is not nonexistent.

original: yod pa ma yin med ma yin //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin med ma yin //
translated: It is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: rigs pas 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pas 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not established by reasoning.

original: dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
translated: All phenomena that appear as entities

original: ngo bo nyid las ma 'das te //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid las ma 'das te //
translated: are not beyond their own essence.

original: rgya mtsho gzugs brnyan me long bzhin //
analyzed: rgya mtsho gzugs brnyan me long bzhin //
translated: Like a reflection in a mirror on the ocean,

original: dran med dbyings nas kun 'byung bas //
analyzed: dran med dbyings nas kun 'byung bas //
translated: everything arises from the nonconceptual dhƒÅtu.üîΩAt that time, it is known as the nature itself.

original: rang bzhin nyid du dus der rig / gnyis med gnyis su med min pas //üîΩma 'das dbyer med ro gcig la //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid du dus der rig / gnyis med gnyis su med min pas // ma 'das dbyer med ro gcig la //
translated: Since nonduality is not dual,üîΩthere is no single point of equipoise

original: gcig tu gzhag par bya ba'ang med //
analyzed: gcig tu gzhag par bya ba'ang med //
translated: in the single taste of the undifferentiated, undeluded state.

original: dangs ma de nyid ma bslad pa'i //
analyzed: dangs ma de nyid ma bslad pa'i //
translated: The pure essence itself is uncontaminated

original: kho na nyid kyis gar ma g-yos //
analyzed: kho na nyid kyis gar ma g-yos //
translated: and does not move from its own state.

original: kho na nyid kyi shes pa la //
analyzed: kho na nyid kyi shes pa la //
translated: In the consciousness of the state itself,

original: 'dzin pa med de ngo bo bral //
analyzed: 'dzin pa med de ngo bo bral //
translated: there is no grasping because it is free from an essence.

original: cir yang mi 'dzin chos kyi sku //
analyzed: cir yang mi 'dzin chos kyi sku //
translated: Not grasping anything at all is the dharmakƒÅya.

original: ngo bo nyid la dbye ba med //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la dbye ba med //
translated: There is no division in the essence itself.

original: 'dzin pa'i cha nas brtags pa gang //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i cha nas brtags pa gang //
translated: Whatever is imputed from the aspect of grasping

original: skye med dbyings kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: skye med dbyings kyi rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of the unborn expanse,

original: zung du 'jug pas tha mi dad //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pas tha mi dad //
translated: they are not different, being united.

original: @127a * // sgro skur bral bas gnyug mar bshad //
analyzed: @127a * // sgro skur bral bas gnyug mar bshad //
translated: Free from exaggeration and denigration, it is explained as innate.üîΩThe celestial palace, the major and minor marks,

original: gzhal yas khang dang mtshan dpe dang // sna tshogs sprul sku gang ston pa //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang dang mtshan dpe dang // sna tshogs sprul sku gang ston pa //
translated: and the various emanations that are shown

original: gdul bya lam la zhugs pa'i stobs //
analyzed: gdul bya lam la zhugs pa'i stobs //
translated: are the power of the disciples who have entered the path.

original: mda' bsnun dag gis gang smras pa //
analyzed: mda' bsnun dag gis gang smras pa //
translated: What the Aindraja·π≠ila said

original: 'di la dmigs su rdul tsam med //
analyzed: 'di la dmigs su rdul tsam med //
translated: is that there is not even an atom here to be observed.

original: phyin ci log gi skye bo la //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi skye bo la //
translated: For people who are mistaken,

original: nyon mongs yul gyi dug 'gyur te //
analyzed: nyon mongs yul gyi dug 'gyur te //
translated: the objects of affliction become poison.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i rim pa yis //
translated: By the stages of how things appear,

original: dbyer med tshul du gnas pa ste //
analyzed: dbyer med tshul du gnas pa ste //
translated: they exist in an indivisible way.

original: 'od gsal ba nyid rnam par bshad //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba nyid rnam par bshad //
translated: It is explained as being luminosity.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo bral //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo bral //
translated: It is free from the nature of nonexistence.

original: tha dad ma yin gnyis su med //
analyzed: tha dad ma yin gnyis su med //
translated: It is not different; it is nondual.

original: khams gsum blo 'das ye shes la //
analyzed: khams gsum blo 'das ye shes la //
translated: The pristine consciousness that is beyond the three realms

original: 'di zhes bya ba'i ming ngam brda //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'i ming ngam brda //
translated: is a name or symbol that is called ‚Äúthis.‚Äù

original: mda' bsnun dag gis gzung du med //
analyzed: mda' bsnun dag gis gzung du med //
translated: The Aindraja·π≠ila said that it cannot be grasped.

original: dbyer med ro gcig ma rtogs na //
analyzed: dbyer med ro gcig ma rtogs na //
translated: If the indivisibility of the single taste is not realized,

original: gnyis su snang ba'i chos rnams kyis //
analyzed: gnyis su snang ba'i chos rnams kyis //
translated: the phenomena of dualistic appearances

original: gal te bskal par rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te bskal par rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: If it is not found in an eon,

original: mchog gi go 'phang mi 'thob ste //
analyzed: mchog gi go 'phang mi 'thob ste //

original: kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin la //üîΩdgag dang sgrub ba ngang gis bral //
analyzed: kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin la // dgag dang sgrub ba ngang gis bral //
translated: In the nature of reality itself,üîΩThere is no inherent negation or affirmation.

original: gnyis med dang las ma g-yos pas //
analyzed: gnyis med dang las ma g-yos pas //
translated: Since it does not waver from nonduality,

original: gang 'dir yid kyi ye shes ni //
analyzed: gang 'dir yid kyi ye shes ni //

original: gcig kyang bral ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig kyang bral ba ma yin no //

original: lhan cig skyes gang bde ba'i ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes gang bde ba'i ro //

analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bdag nyid de //

original: chu bo'i rgyun dang nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: chu bo'i rgyun dang nam mkha' bzhin //

original: mi 'gyur dus rnams kun du gnas //
analyzed: mi 'gyur dus rnams kun du gnas //

analyzed: rtog pa'i rjes 'brang sa mtshan ma'i blos //

original: nam yang shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nam yang shes pa ma yin no //

original: bsam med yul la brtag tu med //
analyzed: bsam med yul la brtag tu med //

original: yul med bsgom pa ga las 'gyur //
analyzed: yul med bsgom pa ga las 'gyur //

original: bsgom med nyid kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: bsgom med nyid kyang yod ma yin //

original: dpe yi don la gang dris pa //
analyzed: dpe yi don la gang dris pa //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la'ang mnyam //

analyzed: bro gar glu dang rol mo yis //

analyzed: phyogs rnams kun du sgra sgrogs shing //

analyzed: dmigs gtad bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis //

analyzed: 'bad pa med par kun du spyad //

analyzed: gnyis su snang ba'i rtog pa thams cad bcom gyur nas //
